attributes.action: Increase 1% pay increase for NHS Nurses
attributes.additional_details: Given the contribution of NHS Nurses during the COVID 19 pandemic an increase of more than 1% should be awarded
attributes.background: Increase proposed 1% pay increase for NHS nurses

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970
